Game_Structure

Class TurningDay

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game_Structure.TurningDay

  • public class TurningDay
extends java.lang.Object
    Turning Class is implemented as a Controller-class (Project is trying to approach to Model-view-controller design pattern) This class contain most of the method for trigger button that change data with certain algorithm (Unrelated to GUI design) It interact with Model class- Game_Profile to create data for the View class Mostly do calculation at the back and only display message in Dialog label to show user the result
    Author:
    Edward Wong - University of Canterbury SENG_201 16/05/2020

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TurningDay(Game_Profile game_Profile, Base_Component base_Component, Barn barn, Controller controller, Inventory inventory)
      Construct game profile and upadte with access of other classes

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void eatBurger()
      eatBurger Limit the daily burger eating count to 2, so that it wont be a loophole as unlimited energy refill
      void endDay()
      endDay happens when the contract end(end of game)
      void HiddenEvent()
      HiddenEvent Hidden event happens when user perform certain action and accumulate certain variable that met hidden condition
      void NextDay()
      NextDay this is a advance controller method which perform 'Sleep' for user to move onto next day A set of action will be performed each time this method get called which - turn into next day, energy, daily allowance, calculate animal allowance Also it refresh the boolean/int status - watering, feedAnimal, Rest(on chair), eat_burger, fertilizing Then it apply the farmerType advantage and display a Morning message to user AnimalAllowance also check for animal healthiness, if condition met, user might get allowance forfeit On the day before Contract end(End game) there will be 3 random event occur randomly, user receive advantage/disadvantage base on certain condition When Animal allwaonce bad case / random event occur, it will overwrite morningmessage Thers also hidden event, when user perform some set of action and accumulate a certain value that met hidden condition, hidden event occur hidden ecent wont happen on the day before ending which will never intersect with random event After all updateAll method is called to update profile in all aspect
      void randomEvent(int random_case)
      randomEvent 3 case of random event happens randomly(by luck and Probability) on the day before ending
      void refreshDaily()
      refreshDaily Refresh all status of perform action to positive on daily base
      void setDialog(java.lang.String text) 
      int testRandom()
      testRandom Randomly decide a number between a range (0 - 2 in this case) for random event
      void updateAll() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • TurningDay

                  Base_Component base_Component,
                  Barn barn,
                  Controller controller,
                  Inventory inventory)
        Construct game profile and upadte with access of other classes
        Parameters:
        game_Profile - Access the data (model class) from Game_Profile
        base_Component - Access to update stats ,energy ,inventory
        barn - Access to allow update barn
        controller - Access ro perform certain trigger actions
        inventory - Access Inventory for updating

    • Method Detail

      • NextDay

        public void NextDay()
        NextDay this is a advance controller method which perform 'Sleep' for user to move onto next day A set of action will be performed each time this method get called which - turn into next day, energy, daily allowance, calculate animal allowance Also it refresh the boolean/int status - watering, feedAnimal, Rest(on chair), eat_burger, fertilizing Then it apply the farmerType advantage and display a Morning message to user AnimalAllowance also check for animal healthiness, if condition met, user might get allowance forfeit On the day before Contract end(End game) there will be 3 random event occur randomly, user receive advantage/disadvantage base on certain condition When Animal allwaonce bad case / random event occur, it will overwrite morningmessage Thers also hidden event, when user perform some set of action and accumulate a certain value that met hidden condition, hidden event occur hidden ecent wont happen on the day before ending which will never intersect with random event After all updateAll method is called to update profile in all aspect

      • randomEvent

        public void randomEvent(int random_case)
        randomEvent 3 case of random event happens randomly(by luck and Probability) on the day before ending
        Parameters:
        random_case - Get a random number from testRandom to decide which random event to occur

      • HiddenEvent

        public void HiddenEvent()
        HiddenEvent Hidden event happens when user perform certain action and accumulate certain variable that met hidden condition

      • refreshDaily

        public void refreshDaily()
        refreshDaily Refresh all status of perform action to positive on daily base

      • testRandom

        public int testRandom()
        testRandom Randomly decide a number between a range (0 - 2 in this case) for random event
        Returns:
        num (a random number generated by system to perform random event)

      • endDay

        public void endDay()
        endDay happens when the contract end(end of game)

      • eatBurger

        public void eatBurger()
        eatBurger Limit the daily burger eating count to 2, so that it wont be a loophole as unlimited energy refill
